questions.question: What is the primary color prominently displayed on the product packaging?
What specific ailment does the product claim to treat, as shown on the box?
What is the product form, as indicated by the description on the packaging?
What is the claimed strength of the product as described on the box?
What is the brand name of the product, visible on the packaging?
What is the net weight of the product as stated on the packaging?
What is the active ingredient listed on the product packaging?
What percentage concentration is the active ingredient listed on the product packaging?
What is the shape of the product container depicted in the image?
What is the overall texture implied by the image of the product packaging?
What type of relief does the product packaging claim to provide?
What is the main text describing the product's function?
What other brand is the product compared to on the packaging?
What is the overall style of the packaging design, considering the typography and color scheme?
What kind of additional information is prominently included in the image and text?
